ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Image routines for ChIPS (CIAO contributed package)

DESC.PARA: The chips_contrib.images module provides image-related routines for ChIPS, and is provided as part of the CIAO contributed scripts package.
The module can be loaded into ChIPS, Sherpa or Python scripts by saying one of the following:
DESC.VERBATIM: from chips_contrib.images import * from chips_contrib.all import *
DESC.PARA: where the second line will load in all the ChIPS contributed routines, not just the imagess module.
This module currenly provides one routine:

ROW.DATA: Scale image axes from pixel coordinates to a physical scale. This routine is re-exported from crates_contrib.images since it is useful for ChIPS users; see "ahelp imextent" for more information.
